shortDescription: This week’s episode kicks off with a message from Lars, followed by a glance back at the European leg of the M72 World Tour, a preview of what’s to come in North America starting this week in New Jersey, plus a few crazy facts about the massive prod
description:
Keep up with all things Metallica by going straight to the source. Welcome to The Metallica Report, THE official Metallica podcast! 
This week’s episode kicks off with a message from Lars, followed by a glance back at the European leg of the M72 World Tour, a preview of what’s to come in North America starting this week in New Jersey, plus a few crazy facts about the massive production. You’ll also hear from Austin Manning, head of the Fifth Member Chapter New York Attitude, about what he’s most looking forward to on this tour and get the scoop on all the weekend activities planned for each city along the way.
New episodes are released weekly and will introduce you to all aspects of Metallica’s world. Whether you hear from the Metallica Family through fan features, the band’s crew at HQ or on the road, or from the guys themselves, you’re sure to get a unique perspective. You’ll also get to know your “people on the inside,” hosts Steffan Chirazi (long-time rock scribe and editor of the band’s online mag, So What!) and Renée Richardson (a well-known Bay Area radio personality who now oversees the band’s foundation, All Within My Hands). 
Follow, download, rate, review, and join Steff and Renée for The Metallica Report every week.
Submit questions or comments for our features Fuel, Road Warriors, or Family Matters: http://metallica.com/podcasts 
Check out the M72 Tour Map: https://m72map.metallica.com 
New Jersey Takeover Link: https://www.metallica.com/tour/2023-08-04-east-rutherford-new-jersey.html#metallica-takeover
Bastardane: https://www.bastardane.com 
OTTTO: https://www.otttoband.com

shortDescription: Weekly News, Features, and Interviews from Metallica HQ and Beyond
description:
The Metallica Report is coming!
Keep up with all things Metallica by going straight to the source for your news. This weekly report is hosted by Steffan Chirazi, long-time rock scribe and editor of the band’s online mag, So What!, and Renée Richardson, a well-known Bay Area radio personality who now oversees the band’s foundation, All Within My Hands.  
Steffan and Renée will keep you in the loop each week with updates, features, and interviews. They’ll also get YOUR questions answered by those in the know. It’s your quick, weekly fix covering our most relevant topics of the day.
http://metallica.lnk.to/TheMetallicaReport
